title: PBE Server

embed.description: Hello Summoners, PBE signups are closed until further notice. The website has been in a poorly functioning state for a while now and we are trying to address all the problems at once instead of throwing a band-aid over it.

body:
Hello,

Recently I wanted to sign up to PBE server just to discover that PBE sign ups have been closed down for 3 months now. Does anyone have an idea when PBE sign ups are coming back or just general thoughts about it? Thanks.

replies.body: Our techs are still working on making the PBE signup process much smoother and easier for everyone. I don't quite yet have a date on when they'll be reopened, but you can be sure to know by checking the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news)!
